pages.title: Kamen Rider Solomon
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber (2020, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:saber/devices/dooms_driver_buckle#dooms_driver_buckle_solomon)Dooms Driver Buckle$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slash$(li)Speed VI$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Haste III$(li)Jump Boost VI$(li)Strength VI
